function.name: select_race_based_on_race_number_for_f1_race_schedule
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "f1_race_schedule", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns the details for the race based on the race number for the track in the F1 season."

function.name: select_race_based_on_id_for_f1_race_schedule
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "f1_race_schedule", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns the race using the ID used in the database for each individual race."

function.name: race_list_for_f1_race_schedule
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "f1_race_schedule", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Lists down all the races in the schedule"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"
